description.zh-cn: 由南京化工大学和南京建筑工程学院于2001年5月合并组建的省属重点建设大学，是中国首批“高等学校创新能力提升计划”和“卓越工程师教育培养计划”重点建设大学。
description.en: A key provincial university formed by the merger of Nanjing University of Chemical Technology and Nanjing Institute of Architectural Engineering in May 2001. It is one of the first universities selected for China's 'Higher Education Innovation Capacity Enhancement Plan' and 'Excellent Engineer Education and Training Program'.

description.zh-cn: 南京工业大学校长。
description.en: President of Nanjing Tech University.

description.zh-cn: 南京工业大学党委书记。
description.en: Secretary of the Party Committee of Nanjing Tech University.

nodes.id: 高等学校创新能力提升计划

zh-cn: 高等学校创新能力提升计划
en: Higher Education Innovation Capacity Enhancement Plan

description.zh-cn: 中国教育部、财政部于2011年启动的一项旨在提升高等教育质量的计划。
description.en: A program launched in 2011 by the Ministry of Education and the Ministry of Finance of China aimed at improving the quality of higher education.

nodes.id: 卓越工程师教育培养计划

zh-cn: 卓越工程师教育培养计划
en: Excellent Engineer Education and Training Program

description.zh-cn: 中国教育部于2010年启动的一项旨在培养高水平工程技术人才的计划。
description.en: A program launched by the Ministry of Education of China in 2010 aimed at cultivating high-level engineering and technical talents.

description.zh-cn: 南京工业大学的前身之一，由南京化工学院于1995年更名而来。
description.en: One of the predecessors of Nanjing Tech University, renamed from Nanjing Institute of Chemical Technology in 1995.

description.zh-cn: 南京工业大学的前身之一，由南京建筑工程学校于1980年升格而成。
description.en: One of the predecessors of Nanjing Tech University, upgraded from Nanjing School of Architectural Engineering in 1980.

description.zh-cn: 南京工业大学最早的源头，成立于1902年，后更名为两江师范学堂。
description.en: The earliest origin of Nanjing Tech University, established in 1902, later renamed Liangjiang Normal School.

description.zh-cn: 由三江师范学堂更名而来，是南京工业大学的源头之一。
description.en: Renamed from Sanjiang Normal School, one of the origins of Nanjing Tech University.

zh-cn: 南京高等师范专科学校

description.zh-cn: 由两江师范学堂演变而来，是南京工业大学的源头之一。
description.en: Evolved from Liangjiang Normal School, one of the origins of Nanjing Tech University.

description.zh-cn: 由南京高等师范学校演变而来，是南京工业大学的源头之一。
description.en: Evolved from Nanjing Higher Normal School, one of the origins of Nanjing Tech University.

description.zh-cn: 南京工业大学的源头之一，其化学工程系是南京化工学院的直接前身。
description.en: One of the origins of Nanjing Tech University. Its Chemical Engineering Department was the direct predecessor of Nanjing Institute of Chemical Technology.

description.zh-cn: 南京工业大学的源头之一，其工学院于1952年参与组建南京工学院。
description.en: One of the origins of Nanjing Tech University. Its College of Engineering participated in the formation of Nanjing Institute of Technology in 1952.

description.zh-cn: 南京工业大学的源头之一，其工科于1952年参与组建南京工学院。
description.en: One of the origins of Nanjing Tech University. Its engineering department participated in the formation of Nanjing Institute of Technology in 1952.

description.zh-cn: 南京工业大学的源头之一，1952年由南京大学工学院、金陵大学工科等组建，其化工系于1958年独立为南京化工学院。
description.en: One of the origins of Nanjing Tech University, formed in 1952 from the College of Engineering of Nanjing University, the engineering department of Ginling University, etc. Its Chemical Engineering Department became the independent Nanjing Institute of Chemical Technology in 1958.

description.zh-cn: 南京化工大学的前身，1958年由南京工学院化工系独立建校。
description.en: The predecessor of Nanjing University of Chemical Technology, established independently in 1958 from the Chemical Engineering Department of Nanjing Institute of Technology.

description.zh-cn: 南京建筑工程学院的最早前身，创建于1915年。
description.en: The earliest predecessor of Nanjing Institute of Architectural Engineering, founded in 1915.

description.zh-cn: 南京建筑工程学院的前身之一，于1933年由同济医工学堂机师科等更名而来。
description.en: One of the predecessors of Nanjing Institute of Architectural Engineering, renamed in 1933 from Tongji Medical and Engineering School's Mechanics Division and others.

description.zh-cn: 南京建筑工程学院的前身，于1950年由同济高级职业学校更名而来。
description.en: The predecessor of Nanjing Institute of Architectural Engineering, renamed from Tongji Senior Vocational School in 1950.

description.zh-cn: 蒋军成为南京工业大学的现任校长。
description.en: Jiang Juncheng is the current president of Nanjing Tech University.

description.zh-cn: 芮鸿岩为南京工业大学的现任党委书记。
description.en: Rui Hongyan is the current Secretary of the Party Committee of Nanjing Tech University.

relationships.target: 高等学校创新能力提升计划

description.zh-cn: 南京工业大学是中国首批“高等学校创新能力提升计划”重点建设大学之一。
description.en: Nanjing Tech University is one of the first key universities in China's 'Higher Education Innovation Capacity Enhancement Plan'.

relationships.target: 卓越工程师教育培养计划

description.zh-cn: 南京工业大学是中国首批“卓越工程师教育培养计划”重点建设大学之一。
description.en: Nanjing Tech University is one of the first key universities in China's 'Excellent Engineer Education and Training Program'.

description.zh-cn: 2001年5月，南京化工大学与南京建筑工程学院合并组建南京工业大学。
description.en: In May 2001, Nanjing University of Chemical Technology and Nanjing Institute of Architectural Engineering merged to form Nanjing Tech University.

description.zh-cn: 2001年5月，南京建筑工程学院与南京化工大学合并组建南京工业大学。
description.en: In May 2001, Nanjing Institute of Architectural Engineering and Nanjing University of Chemical Technology merged to form Nanjing Tech University.

description.zh-cn: 1995年4月，南京化工学院更名为南京化工大学。
description.en: In April 1995, Nanjing Institute of Chemical Technology was renamed Nanjing University of Chemical Technology.

description.zh-cn: 1958年，南京工学院化工系被划出，独立建立南京化工学院。
description.en: In 1958, the Department of Chemical Engineering of Nanjing Institute of Technology was separated to independently establish Nanjing Institute of Chemical Technology.

description.zh-cn: 1952年，南京大学工学院参与组建南京工学院。
description.en: In 1952, the College of Engineering of Nanjing University participated in the formation of Nanjing Institute of Technology.

description.zh-cn: 1952年，金陵大学工科参与组建南京工学院。
description.en: In 1952, the engineering department of Ginling University participated in the formation of Nanjing Institute of Technology.

description.zh-cn: 三江师范学堂于1905年更名为两江师范学堂。
description.en: Sanjiang Normal School was renamed Liangjiang Normal School in 1905.

description.zh-cn: 两江师范学堂后演变为南京高等师范学校。
description.en: Liangjiang Normal School later evolved into Nanjing Higher Normal School.

description.zh-cn: 南京高等师范学校后演变为国立东南大学。
description.en: Nanjing Higher Normal School later evolved into National Southeast University.

description.zh-cn: 国立东南大学经过数次更名后成为国立中央大学。
description.en: After several name changes, National Southeast University became National Central University.

description.zh-cn: 国立中央大学后更名为国立南京大学，最终定名为南京大学。
description.en: National Central University was later renamed National Nanjing University and finally named Nanjing University.

description.zh-cn: 1980年5月，南京建筑工程学校升格为南京建筑工程学院。
description.en: In May 1980, Nanjing School of Architectural Engineering was upgraded to Nanjing Institute of Architectural Engineering.

description.zh-cn: 1950年，同济高级职业学校更名为南京建筑工程学校。
description.en: In 1950, Tongji Senior Vocational School was renamed Nanjing School of Architectural Engineering.

description.zh-cn: 南京建筑工程学院的前身是创建于1915年的同济医工学堂机师科，1933年更名为同济高级职业学校。
description.en: The predecessor of Nanjing Institute of Architectural Engineering was the Mechanics Division of Tongji Medical and Engineering School, founded in 1915, and renamed Tongji Senior Vocational School in 1933.
